overview.label: Goal
overview.text: To provide the underbanked and unbanked community a service for reentering the banking system through USPS. The service should be a stepping stone back into traditional banking, not a replacement for it.

overview.label: What I Did
overview.text: I created a hypothetical extension to the USPS website that educates the user about financial managment and good banking habits through workshop-style videos and challenges.

overview.label: Goal
overview.text: Create an Enterprise App that helps you do your job or a job you have had in the past more efficiently.

overview.label: Problem Statement
overview.text: I work as an English teacher for the Brazilian language school Conversation Sem Enrolation (that's a mix between English and Portuguese that translates to conversation without hiccups/confusion). At my job, teacher-to-student, and teacher-to-teacher communication is done through WhatsApp. This doesn’t allow for organization or efficiency of file-sharing or keeping.

overview.label: What I Did
overview.text: I create an app for teachers and tutors that helps them organize their class files and facilitates giving lessons though skype.

overview.label: Overview
overview.text: Radio is an interactive museum exhibit for the Museum of Communication in Scottland, UK, celebrating the invention and use of radio. Something so invisible and integrated into our lives in ways many people don’t know, radio has completely changed communication for us since the early 1890s.

overview.label: The Challenge
overview.text: The Museum of Communication has a very small audience group: senior citizens, and the exhibits are basic and sometimes boring. My challenge with this project was to create an interactive exhibit that would widen the visitor demographic and be educational and fun for everyone.

overview.label: What I Did
overview.text: I created an interactive walk-through exhibit that places the visitor in the environment and time in which an important event relating to radio happened. This immersive experience allows the visitor to interact with the exhibit in a way that captivates their imagination and makes it easier and more fun to learn about this technical topic.
